comment: I've three suggestions for you, Paras, 1) look into ppl's eyes and talk, 2) take care of how you smell  coz ppl can smell, 3) don't talk so loudly from 309 balcony bcz ppl notice. And you do look like Pushpek Siddhu. Cheers to all our pre exam anxiety texts and crazy ideas 🥹😂😂
